issue.title: [C++][CMake] Add support for Brotli/utf8proc provided by vcpkg
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18287](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18287). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
vcpkg provides CMake packages for Brotli and utf8proc with "unofficial-" prefix.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18287?focusedCommentId=17634680) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14609
